title: Virtual Assistant
job_overview:
Job Description:
We are seeking a highly organized, proactive, and reliable Virtual Assistant to join our team. The ideal candidate will provide administrative support, manage tasks efficiently, and contribute to the smooth operation of our daily activities. This role requires excellent communication skills, attention to detail, and the ability to multitask effectively in a remote working environment.

Key Responsibilities:

        •       Manage and respond to emails in a timely manner
        •       Schedule and coordinate meetings, appointments, and travel arrangements
        •       Handle administrative tasks such as data entry, document preparation, and filing
        •       Assist in project management and follow-up on pending tasks
        •       Conduct research and prepare reports as needed
        •       Maintain and update databases and contact lists
        •       Provide customer service support and address client inquiries
        •       Perform other administrative duties as assigned

REQUIREMENTS:

   •       Must be okay with ability to grow into a role taking on more responsibilities and increased pay
   •       Must have High-Speed Internet
   •       Must have back up generator
